desc: Tolkien Elvish translations in Neo-Sindarin & Tengwar available by commission for geeks who love Lord of the Rings and the Silmarillion. @WizardWayKris also crafts essential oil blends based on Middle-Earth and Harry Potter potions, as well as Starscape accessories for astrology lovers and fans of Korean pop group BTS.

layout.text: Welcome to Elf-boi.com, the home of TikTok's Resident Elf-boi, Kris. This site is dedicated to sparking a warm, comforting glow across the modern void that divides us. Quirky queerness. Cosmic reflection. A hint of Elvendom on Earth.
